body.p: This document is used to test spell-checking and grammar rules with both positive and negative test cases.
A complete list of rules covered by the DITA validator can be found in the error table. The following <chapters> contain a set of test DITA <topics>. Each demonstrating a broken validation rule.
The <topic> files are sorted as follows:

ul.li: The base validation DITA-OT plugin (com.here.validate.svrl) – this <chapter> contains a two common textual validation rules.
The spell-checker DITA-OT plugin (com.here.validate.svrl.spell-checker) – This <chapter> contains a set of English language spelling and grammar rules.
